notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.G.U. was in charge of the data curation of the patient; A.M.-O. and M.G.U. were in charge of the writing of the original manuscript; R.H.-C. was in charge of the methodology for the identification by molecular biology of the etiologic agent ; C.P.-J. was responsible for reviewing and editing the manuscript as well as submitting it for publication. R.H.-G. was in charge of the methodology for the identification of the agent in the pathology specimen. K.E.-B. also participated in the data curation of the patient and in the writing of the original manuscript.All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
